Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute at Grand/Homan
ShortDescription: 65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via: Grand, Homan, Division, and Grand, due to, street blockage, near Grand/Homan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: Grand, Homan, Division, and Grand, due to, street blockage, near Grand/Homan.

Allow extra travel time.
